Headline: Loop-bound Orange Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick employee at Kedzie. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Orange Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier sick employee at Kedzie.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
